title: AA Flight 77 at the Pentagon
content:
AA Flight 77 at the Pentagon Panel Presentation via Zoom Colorado 9/11 Truth presents their next Zoom presentation .
we will show David Chandler ’ s new 18-minute video , AA Flight 77 at the Pentagon , followed by a panel discussion with the presenters from last year ’ s Conference on the 9/11 Pentagon Evidence in Denver .
An audience Q & A will follow .
Panelists will include David Chandler , Wayne Coste , Ken Jenkins , Warren Stutt , and John Wyndham ( see below ) .
Chandler will moderate the event along with Fran Shure and @ @ @ @ @ @ @ We will start the program by viewing the video .
You may also watch it in advance in order to formulate questions at http : //911speakout.org/aa-flight-77-at-the-pentagon-2 , or view it right here : Until recently , most of the researchers on the panel would have said the evidence about what hit the Pentagon pointed to “ a large plane consistent with a 757 , and probably AA77 itself.
” New research has led a number of them to actually identify the plane as AA Flight 77 .
The video tells the fascinating story @ @ @ @ @ @ @ , and the researchers who worked collaboratively on this issue will be present to answer your questions directly .
Please log on a few minutes early since you will need time to follow instructions from Zoom .
Dial by your location +1 669 900 6833 US ( San Jose ) +1 253 215 8782 US ( Tacoma ) +1 346 248 7799 US ( Houston ) +1 929 205 6099 US ( New York ) +1 301 715 8592 US ( Germantown ) +1 312 626 6799 US ( Chicago ) Meeting ID @ @ @ @ @ @ @ Find your local number : https : //zoom.us/u/azpvuDNIZ This presentation is sponsored by Colorado 9/11 Truth .
author: Fran Shure
